question: Which country houses the "Pshav-Khevsureti National Park"?
explanation: The Pshav-Khevsureti National Park is an IUCN category II national park located in Dusheti Municipality, Mtskheta-Mtianeti region of Georgia. This park has been established by direct involvement of World Wide Fund for Nature. Pshav-Khevsureti National Park will help the conservation of the leopard in the Caucasus, as well as the Bezoar goat, endemic East Caucasian tur, brown bear, European lynx, Caucasian red deer, chamois.
